Uses of Class
org.opengrok.indexer.history.Repository

  • Packages that use Repository 
    Package Description
    org.opengrok.indexer.history
    From the OpenGrok internals: To get the version control history Analyzer Guru, calls his old friend the good old History Guru.

    • Uses of Repository in org.opengrok.indexer.history

      Subclasses of Repository in org.opengrok.indexer.history 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AccuRevRepository
      Access to an AccuRev repository (here an actual user workspace) AccuRev requires that a user logs into their system before it can be used.
      class  BazaarRepository
      Access to a Bazaar repository.
      class  BitKeeperRepository
      Access to a BitKeeper repository.
      class  ClearCaseRepository
      Access to a ClearCase repository.
      class  CVSRepository
      Access to a CVS repository.
      class  GitRepository
      Access to a Git repository.
      class  MercurialRepository
      Access to a Mercurial repository.
      class  MonotoneRepository
      Access to a Monotone repository.
      class  PerforceRepository
      Access to a Perforce repository.
      class  RazorRepository
      Adds access to to a Razor Repository A brief and simplistic overview of Razor Razor uses the term 'Group' for what might traditionally be called a repository, that is a collection of files and folders.
      class  RCSRepository
      Access to an RCS repository.
      class  RepoRepository
      Access to a Git repository.
      class  SCCSRepository
      This class gives access to repositories built on top of SCCS (including TeamWare).
      class  SSCMRepository
      Access to Surround SCM repository.
      class  SubversionRepository
      Access to a Subversion repository.
      Methods in org.opengrok.indexer.history that return Repository 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Repository RepositoryFactory.getRepository(File file)
      Calls RepositoryFactory.getRepository(File, boolean) with file and false.
      protected Repository HistoryGuru.getRepository(File path) 
      static Repository RepositoryFactory.getRepository(File file, boolean interactive)
      Calls RepositoryFactory.getRepository(File, boolean, boolean) with file, interactive, and false.
      static Repository RepositoryFactory.getRepository(File file, boolean interactive, boolean isNested)
      Returns a repository for the given file, or null if no repository was found.
      static Repository RepositoryFactory.getRepository(RepositoryInfo info, boolean interactive)
      Returns a repository for the given file, or null if no repository was found.
      Methods in org.opengrok.indexer.history that return types with arguments of type Repository 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<Class<? extends Repository>> RepositoryFactory.getRepositoryClasses()
      Get a list of all available repository handlers.
